caption.p: Top row: Time series showing amount of biodegraded oil (left) and amount of oil in the sediments (right), at the end of each simulation, as a function of start date of the simulation, for the Svalbard scenario. Present and future shown separately. Bottom row: Histogram and empirical distribution for the time series above, with present and future shown separately. Note that the axis has been truncated for visibility in the sediment plot. The height of the first column is 0.24 for the present and 0.19 for the future
